text: RIC-Finance is a Russian investment company, one of the biggest government- based companies in trust management, focused on serving the customs brokerage needs, asset management, depository service, investment banking service and financial advisement.RBC Ratings The firm was founded in 2008, headquartered in Moscow, Russia, with additional offices in four cities: Volgograd, Stavropol, Makhachkala and Kemerovo. ==The owners and the management== Main shareholder is the Republican investment company, owned by the Ministry of Property Relations of the Sakha Republic (Yakutia). ==Business Activity and Services== * Brokerage activity (MICEX, RTS Standard, FORTS, RTS Classic, RTS- SGK) * Asset management * Investment banking (direct investment, underwriting IPO, assist in mergers and acquisitions, bond issuance) * Financial advisement * Investment education * Ancillary services (margin trading, deposit services, online-trading, daily market analysis) On July 30, 2010 Joint Stock Company “Sakhatransneftegas” launched the initial public offering of its stock (series 02, three year maturity) with the assistance of Limited liability Company “RIC-Finance” in the amount of 2.5 billion rubles. The main activities of the Sakhatransneftegas Company are construction and operation of gas facilities in Yakutia.RIC-Finance assisted Joint Stock Company “Sakhatransneftegas”in launching the Initial Public Offering of its stock//, August 19, 2010 ==Algorithmic trading== The company offers advanced technologies in stock market trading. ===LiveTrade Scalping=== The program is developed for professional players on the stock market, who needs to make a lot of buy-sale transactions a day. Therefore, traders are very demanding to the speed of issuing application. High speed of processing applications and displaying information are the most important in active trading. In this program high speed is reached due to the technology DDE. LiveTrade Scalping product is one of the most fastest and user-friendly algorithmic trading programs for scalpers developed for terminal QUIK. ===Livetrade Scalping Direct=== The program is created for direct access to the FORTS, and makes it easier to do scalping on FORTS. The main problem during connection to the RTS server is reducing delays through the trading session on the FORTS market. Multifunctional and fast trade blotter with many “hotkeys” allows not only one button trading, but also one click trading. The best Russian trading scalpers were involved in developing this program, whose rich experience helped to imbed all necessary functions for scalping on FORTS in this program. It is one of the few terminals of direct access with the possibility to plot and pursue technical analysis. ===Privod Bondarya scalping=== This program is specially designed for aggressive scalping on FORTS. The operation of the program was demonstrated on the international exposition the MOSCOW FINANCIAL EXPO 2010. ===Quot pro scalping=== The program was developed by the scalpers of the Pskov Stock Company, headed by Andrei Berittsa.The troll from Pskov. Andrew Beritts earns on the futures market thousands of percent per annum. How? He wants to share knowledge // Forbes (magazine), 07/2008 It includes a full set of basic functions for active traders: sending offsetting and/or limit orders by only one click, automatic correction of its amount, automatic positioning of stop- loss and take-profit orders, fast positioning of conditional orders. ==Rating Agencies== Since 2009, limited liability company RIC-Finance has become a member of the National Association of Securities Dealers (NAUFOR).Professional participants of the stock market. Company's card // NAUFOR This association brings together leading financial companies in Russia. In June 2010, National Rating Agency assigned an individual rating of reliability «A-» level to the investment company RIC- Finance (i.e. high reliability, the third level).Personal reliability rating of investment companies / / ==Awards== * "RIC-Finance" received the nationwide award "Company of the Year – 2010”"РИК- Финанс" удостоилась национальной премии "Компания года – 2010" //, December 13, 2010 ==References== ==External links== * RIC Finance Category:Brokerage firms Category:Investment companies of Russia Official website of the permanent mission of the Sakha Republic (Yakutia) in Moscow NAUFOR РИА Новости
